title: Most Ghanaian stars buy followers on social media – Amanda Jissih
text:
Date: 19-10-2015 Time: 02:10:42:pm Amanda Jissih 
Amanda Jissih, host of Showbiz Fylla on Hitz FM, has disclosed that most Ghanaian celebrities buy followers on social media networks. 
According to her, the huge numbers people see on some fan pages of Ghanaian celebrities are not real but there seem to be a good reason for celebrities wanting huge followers. Speaking on the Standpoint TV with Gifty Anti, Amanda said companies easily contract celebrities with huge followers on social media networks to advertise their products. Amanda Jissih further said these celebrities buy followers on Facebook, twitter, instagram and other platforms because “we want to make money and if that is the only to make money, then we will do it.” Speaking on the topic, ‘female celebrities and negative publicity’ the radio show host disclosed that some Ghanaian celebrities pay bloggers to publish bad stories in order to bring attention on them. Touching on negative attacks on her, Amanda revealed that she has heard a lot of people talk evil against her size but she is not worried anymore. According to her, she usually blocks people who talk ill about her on social media in order to have time for her job. 
She said she has blocked over 100 contacts who constantly harass and attack her based on her body size. The 100, she said, included her relatives, fans and unknown persons.
